sentences.english: Holiday makers travelling in Shanghai must taste raw-fried steam bread.
sentences.chinese: 生煎馒头是游客在上海旅行必尝的食品。

sentences.english: These parts of Ord Mantell are not intended for tourists.
sentences.chinese: 曼特尔兵站的这些部分无意接待游客。

sentences.english: Avoid winking at someone from Chinese Hong Kong, because it's considered rude.
sentences.chinese: 别对中国的香港游客挤眉弄眼，他们会认为这很粗鲁。

sentences.english: A lot of Chinese and foreign tourists to see the tree after hanging its amazing beauty repeatedly.
sentences.chinese: 很多中外游客看到树挂后都连声惊叹其美丽。

sentences.english: The building consists of two parts as visitor center and rural guest houses.
sentences.chinese: 该建筑分为游客中心和乡村客舍两部分。

sentences.english: On the half way to the mountain, the tourists had a rest and snacked on some bread.
sentences.chinese: 在登山的途中，游客们休息了会儿，吃了点儿面包。

sentences.english: The beauty of JiuZhaigou attracts tourists from the Europe and far afield.
sentences.chinese: 九寨沟的美景吸引了来自欧洲乃至更远方的游客。

sentences.english: "Carnival of National Day " was staged in Changsha Windows of the World on Sept. 29.
sentences.chinese: 9月29日，游客在长沙世界之窗参加水果花车巡游。

sentences.english: Most visitors to Kenya come to see the animals.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的游客来肯亚都是来看动物的。

sentences.english: On the Monkey Mountain the monkeys frolicked and played happily, which attracted the eyes of many tourists.
sentences.chinese: 猴山上猴子们欢闹玩耍，吸引不少游客的目光。

sentences.english: Visitors are requested not to touch the exhibits.
We’re all looking forward to more visitors coming.
sentences.chinese: 我们所有人都盼着能多来点游客。

sentences.english: Now visitors to the reserve will have a chance to witness the same.
sentences.chinese: 而今，到保护区的游客们同样有机会目睹这样的美景。

sentences.english: He lined out the route for the sightseers.
sentences.chinese: 他给游客们画出了路线图。
每年都有35万名游客走过这里。

sentences.english: Prior to 2001, the Northern Areas were attracting a steadily growing stream of Western visitors.
sentences.chinese: 2001年以前北方地区吸引的西方游客稳步增长。

definition: to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
